about_the_game:
Chasing your heart.

Beat, Heart, Beat is an autoscrolling rhythm-platformer centered around slashing through enemies to the music to maintain your momentum and traverse your way towards your own heart. There are three directions to slash - up, down and right in front of you. Slash in the correct direction to aim your attacks at enemies and dash into them. Performing a series of slashes to the correct rhythmic pattern is the key to reaching the end of the stage and advancing onwards to your heart.

Demo Content

  • 5 playable charts with Easy, Normal and Hard difficulties

  • An energetic and colorful alt-rock soundtrack!

  • Evocative mixed-media environments inspired by collage art

  • Over 5+ enemy types, each with different properties for platforming

  • Unique cue enemies that mix tricky rhythmic patterns right into the action

This is a demo for Beat, Heart, Beat, which will launch with many exciting new bits of content and polish. Stay tuned and enjoy the demo!

short_description: A psychedelic rhythm-based action platformer about chasing after your heart. Run and jump through surrealistic environments and slash enemies to traverse gaps, perform air combos, and complete tricky rhythmic patterns! Embark on an alternative rock-inspired musical journey through the psyche.
